question: From which date is the 2nd phase of COVID vaccination is set to commence in India?
explanation:
The Government of India has given a nod for 2nd round of vaccination for the COVID 19 disease and it is set to commence from March 1st 2021.
This phase of vaccination is targeted at people above the age of 60 years and those above 45 years old with comorbidities. The beneficiaries can get themselves vaccinated in any Government hospital free of cost as well as at private clinics.
